job_history.work_description: Collaborated with community members to educate the public regarding issues such as drug abuse prevention and traffic safety. Collaborated with community leaders, organizations and public agencies to promote the organizations community service programs. Maintained daily records of children's individual activities, behaviors, meals and naps. Created and implemented developmentally-appropriate curriculum that addressed all learning styles. Established a safe play environment for the children. Supervised children on field trips to local parks, fire stations and zoos. Directed all protective placement, case management, parent education and family reunification activities. Advised patients on community resources, made referrals and devised realistic treatment plans. Communicated with public social and welfare agencies to obtain and provide information.

Surpassed revenue goals in four consecutive quarters. Created training manuals targeted at resolving even the most difficult customer issues. Developed, implemented and monitored programs to maximize customer satisfaction. Interviewed, hired and trained new quality customer service representatives. Developed and implemented policies, procedures and process improvement initiatives to improve retention rates and increase customer satisfaction.

Collected customer feedback and made process changes to exceed customer satisfaction goals. Developed process improvements to enhance efficiency and effectiveness of inter-department call center operations. Opened new customer accounts, including checking, savings and lines of credit. Examined checks for identification and endorsement. Processed treasury, tax and loan payments.

Managed the receptionist area, including greeting visitors and responding to telephone and in-person requests for information. Dispersed incoming mail to correct recipients throughout the office. Created and maintained spreadsheets using advanced Excel functions and calculations to develop reports and lists. Received and distributed faxes and mail in a timely manner.

Computed accurate sales prices for purchase transactions. Eliminated outdated records by sending the records to be scanned. Identified and resolved system and account issues. Verified and logged in deadlines for responding to daily inquiries.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience as a team lead and has supervised children on field trips, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated strong communication skills through various roles, including educating the public, advising patients, and communicating with public social and welfare agencies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating and implementing developmentally-appropriate curriculum, devising realistic treatment plans, and developing and implementing policies and procedures, suggesting strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in customer-facing roles, including customer service, sales, and account management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating and maintaining spreadsheets using advanced Excel functions and calculations, suggesting a solid working proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated strong time management skills through various roles, including managing daily records, responding to telephone and in-person requests, and meeting deadlines, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Has experience in using advanced Excel functions and calculations to develop reports and lists, suggesting strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating training manuals, interviewing, hiring, and training new customer service representatives, suggesting strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Case Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in directing protective placement, case management, parent education, and family reunification activities, suggesting strong proficiency in case management.
